body_text:
With regards to Lead Users, the goal is to send out surveys that we think can identify Lead Users, and then analyze the Telemetry profiles of those users to identify patterns from Telemetry data that we think are good indicators of Lead Users (hardware? customizations?).
Legal bug: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1313453
Spec
Add a new boolean argument to the show-heartbeat action that is displayed in the admin as a checkbox with the label "Include unique user ID in post-answer-url and Telemetry". When checked, the action should append the unique UUID we generate on the client to the surveyId that gets logged in telemetry, separated with a double-colon (::). It should also alter the query parameters passed to in the postAnswerUrl argument to include the unique UUID.
The UUID in question should be the one we include in filter expressions under normandy.userId.
body_html:
With regards to Lead Users, the goal is to send out surveys that we think can identify Lead Users, and then analyze the Telemetry profiles of those users to identify patterns from Telemetry data that we think are good indicators of Lead Users (hardware? customizations?).

Legal bug: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1313453

Spec

Add a new boolean argument to the show-heartbeat action that is displayed in the admin as a checkbox with the label "Include unique user ID in post-answer-url and Telemetry". When checked, the action should append the unique UUID we generate on the client to the surveyId that gets logged in telemetry, separated with a double-colon (::). It should also alter the query parameters passed to in the postAnswerUrl argument to include the unique UUID.

The UUID in question should be the one we include in filter expressions under normandy.userId.
title: Tie SurveyGizmo Answers to Telemetry Data
body:
With regards to Lead Users, the goal is to send out surveys that we think can identify Lead Users, and then analyze the Telemetry profiles of those users to identify patterns from Telemetry data that we think are good indicators of Lead Users (hardware? customizations?).

Legal bug: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1313453

## Spec
Add a new boolean argument to the `show-heartbeat` action that is displayed in the admin as a checkbox with the label "Include unique user ID in post-answer-url and Telemetry". When checked, the action should append the unique UUID we generate on the client to the `surveyId` that gets logged in telemetry, separated with a double-colon (`::`). It should also alter the query parameters passed to in the `postAnswerUrl` argument to include the unique UUID.

The UUID in question should be the one we include in filter expressions under `normandy.userId`.
